## Description
This repository contains R scripts used to generate NEON's Stream Morphology data product http://data.neonscience.org/data-product-view?dpCode=DP4.00131.001. Scripts are provided for reference and for use by the external community.  

<!-- ****** Usage ****** -->
## Usage
This repo contains a subfolder, */Post-Processed_R_Scripts*, where R scripts (geoMorphTransectMetrics.RMD & geomorphThalwegMetrics.RMD) utilized for post-processing of NEON stream morphology data can be accessed.
